init

public void init()
Description copied from interface: ISystem
Initializes this System with default values.

Specified by:
init in interface ISystem

start

public void start()
Description copied from interface: ISystem
Sets the flag that marks this System as ready. This method is called automatically by Core when it begins tracking this System.

Specified by:
start in interface ISystem

work

public void work()
Description copied from interface: ISystem
Executes this System's work if it is ready. This method is called automatically by Core.

Specified by:
work in interface ISystem

stop

public void stop()
Description copied from interface: ISystem
Sets the flag that marks this System as not ready. This method is called automatically by Core when it stops tracking this System.

Specified by:
stop in interface ISystem
